import React, {Component} from 'react'; import Header from './header'; import Call_action from './call_action'; import Footer from './footer'; class Home extends Component{ render(){ return(

User Agreement

General

Newdex is a platform for users to exchange digital assets and provides related services.

When you use Newdex, that means you have read, understand, agree to accept and comply with the following user agreement (hereinafter referred to as "this Agreement") if you do not agree to comply with this agreement, please do not enter the Newdex. We reserve the right to make reasonable amendments to this agreement from time to time. As long as the natural person or other subject who logs in Newdex is regarded as Newdex user, and for the convenience of expression, the following uses "You" or other second person refferred to. Newdex or “We” or other fisrt person reffers to Newdex platform.

User protocol

1. About digital assets

1.1 The digital assets are not issued by any financial institution, company or Newdex .

1.2 The digital asset market is new, uncertainty, and with risks may not increase. 

1.3 Digital assets are mainly used by speculators currently. Relatively small use in the retail and commercial markets. There is a high risk of digital assets trade, it’s all-day trading, and there is no limit of highs and lows. Prices are highly volatile due to the influence of market makers and global government policies.

1.4 Digital assets transaction may be suspended or prohibited at any time due to the enactment or modification of laws, regulations and regulatory documents.

Digital assets transaction is extremely risky and not suitable for most people. You must  understand this investment may cause some loss or total loss, so you should carefully  determine how much investment’s loss you can bear. You should clear that digital assets have derivative risks. Suggest you to seek the assistance of your financial advisor, if you have any questions. Moreover, in addition to the risks mentioned above, there are risks that are not predictable. You should carefully consider and use your clear judgment to assess your financial situation and the above risks first, and then make decision to buy or sell digital assets. You should bear all losses for your decisions, and we will not be responsible for these.

2 , About platform

2.1 The “Newdex.io” is Newdex’s only official external information publishing platform.

2.2 You know Newdex only as a platform for you to obtain digital assets information, find  traders, negotiate and conduct transactions on digital assets. Newdex doesn’t participate in your any transactions. Therefore, you should be careful to distinguish the authenticity, legality and validity of the relevant digital assets and information, and bear the liabilities and losses arising from them.

2.3 Any comments, messages, discussions, analyses, prices, suggestions and other information of Newdex are general market reviews and do not constitute any investment advice. We are not liable for any direct or indirect losses which caused by these informations, including, but not limited to, any loss of profit.

2.4 Newdex’s content will be changed at any time without further notice, we have taken reasonable measures to ensure the accuracy of the information on the website, but we do not guarantee its accuracy level. We will not be liable for any loss, directly or indirectly, arising from The following situation: information on Newdex; network delay or failure to link the Internet; transmit or receive notices or information delay or failure. 

2.5 Newdex reserves the right to immediately refuse your address for any transaction, depending on two situation：if Newdex judges that you have violated this agreement or

according to the laws of your jurisdiction, the services provided by Newdex or the services you use by Newdex are illegal. 

2.6 You will not participate in or initiate any form of market manipulation, including deceptive trading orders or other forms of market manipulation.

2.7 It is forbidden to use Newdex for all illegal trading activities, such as money laundering, smuggling, commercial bribery, etc. If such incidents are discovered, Newdex will take any measures, including but not limited to freezing accounts, notifying relevant authorities, etc. We do not assume all responsibility arising therefrom and reserve the right to pursue liability with the relevant parties.

 3. Trading rules

You are committed to complying with the following trading rules in Newdex and Newdex's transactions with other users.

3.1 Browse transaction information

When you view trading information in Newdex, you should carefully read all the contents of the transaction information, including but not limited to price, entrust amount, fee, buy or sell direction. You should accept all the content contained in the transaction information first, then click the button to trade.

3.2 Submit the order

You can submit a transaction order after you have reviewed the transaction information and confirmed it. You submit the transaction entrustment, means you authorize Newdex to represent you in the corresponding transaction combination. Newdex will automatically complete the matching transaction when there are orders that match your entrusted price without prior notice to you.

3.3 View transaction details

You can confirm your history transaction details by checking the corresponding transaction record in the transaction details of the Order Center.

3.4 Cancel / modify the transaction

You have the right to revoke or modify the order at any time before the transaction has been completed.

 4. Feeand transaction costs

4.1 All transactions may be charged.

 5. Use restrictions

When you visit and use Newdex:

5.1 Do not attempt to compromise the security or integrity of our computing system or network. If our services are hosted by any third party, you must not attempt to compromise the security or integrity of the third party computing system and network.

5.2 It is prohibited to use or access Newdex to transmit or exchange cryptocurrencies or tokens that are directly or indirectly related to any criminal or fraudulent activity (including terrorism or tax evasion).

5.3 Do not attempt to access Newdex's computing system or any material (except that you have explicit access) without authorization.

5.4 Do not send or enter any documents, offensive content, material or data that violates any law (including data or other material that you are not authorized to use under copyright or trade secret protection) which may damage any other person's computing device or software into Newdex.

5.5 No attempt to modify, copy, adapt, copy, decompile, disassemble or reverse engineer any computer program used to provide our services or run Newdex (except where necessary and strictly used during normal operation).

5.6 It is necessary to ensure that all information required to visit the Newdex is properly kept and kept confidential.

5.7 You must confirm that you are 16 years old or older and have a legal age for contracting under different applicable laws. Your registration, selling, buying, or posting of information, etc. at Newdex should be subject to the same. Jurisdictional sovereign countries or regions relevant laws and regulations. And you must have sufficient ability to accept these terms, and enter into transactions, use Newdex for digital assets transactions.

5.8 We are not responsible for any problems cause with the use of the Enterprize Operation System(EOS) platform, EOSIO code, third party EOS wallet loophole. 

5.9 We do not guarantee that there will be no interruption or error in the use of Newdex. For systems that are used to visit Newdex (including public telephone services, computer networks and the Internet), the operation and usability are unpredictable, and may interfere with or obstruct access to the website from time to time. Newdex is not responsible for any impediment or obstruction that prevents you from accessing or using Newdex’s service.

5.10 When Newdex is used in an Internet environment where computer equipment is provided by you or a third party, any function of Newdex will depend on such computer equipment. Newdex will not be responsible for the timeliness of Newdex’s operation.

5.11 By using our services, you agree that the execution of all transactions on the blockchain is ultimately irreversible.

5.12 By using our services, you agree that Newdex reserves the right to liquidate any transaction (regardless of the profit or loss of the transaction) at any time.

 6.User wallet

6.1 If you use Newdex, you should keep all usernames and passwords required for your third-party EOS wallet confidential and restrict access and reading to your computer. Do not use Newdex for any transactions if only you discover that your third-party EOS wallet has been used without authorization or there is any other security issue. You agree to be solely responsible for the activities that occur in or related to your third-party EOS wallet. We reserve the right to refuse service and terminate transactions related to a specific address.

6.2. Newdex will not request or save the user's private key in any way. Newdex is not responsible for the loss caused by the leakage or loss of the user's private key.

Privacy Policy

1.Collected information 1 Using Newdex, means you agree that we will use cookies to track your every action, collect and remember all the information you left, including but not limited to your IP address, geographical location and other information. 1.2 When you use Newdex or the services we provide, we maybe improve the function of Newdex to enhance your experience of using Newdex and the services security. Or on the basis of the court, applicable laws and regulations, other government agencies with jurisdiction, collect more necessary information through Newdex's proprietary mailbox or other measures that we consider compliant, we will update the function.

2.Trading monitoring

2.1 We set and adjust the daily maximum limit of transaction and withdrawal amout according to the security and the actual transaction situation.

2.2 If the transaction is concentrated in a user or there is an unreasonable situation, our professional team will evaluate and decide if they are suspicious. 

2.3 If we judge that it is a suspicious transaction, we may take restrictive measures such as suspending the transaction, rejecting the transaction, and even if it is possible to reverse the transaction as soon as possible, and report to the competent authority, but will not notify you.  

2.4 We reserve the right to refuse applications from people who do not fit the international anti-money laundering standards or who can be considered as political public figures. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate the transaction based on our own judgment as suspicious transaction at any time, but we do not violate any of our obligations and responsibilities by taking these measures. 

3.The reason for collecting information

3.1 Provision and maintenance services

Use the collected information to maintain our service and authenticate the user. We use the IP address and unique identifier stored in your Cookie to verify your identity and provide services. Based on legal obligations and system requirements, we can not be able to provide services without identification, contact information and transaction-related information in such case.

3.2 Protect users

Use collected information to protect platforms, user accounts, and files. Use IP addresses and cookie data to prevent attacks like spam, phishing, and distributed denial of service (DDoS). Analysis of trading activities for early detection of fraud and money flowing into suspicious accounts.

3.3 Compliance with legal and regulatory requirements

Newdex bases on the principle of respecting the personal privacy and data security. When the government requires or user’s general requests, we do not disclose or provide any personal information to a third party without the approval of the legal team and the consent of the user.

3.4 , Measuring website performance

We analyze the website data to understand the user's using experience better. The team of operation continues to analyze data to ensure the user experience is continuously optimized and that all problems in using are resolved in time.

3.5 Communication with users

For communicating with users directly , we collect personal information such as e-mail address, to help users solve problems, timely notification, transactions, and account security and other related activities. We will not be able to respond to requests and questions submitted by users without erifying their identities before communication. All communication will be properly kept in the Newdex for review of accuracy.

3.6 Enforcement of user agreement and other agreements

For Newdex and our users, it is important to keep reviewing to prevent potential irregularities. In order to protect the interests of users, we carefully and rigorously implement the agreement signed with the third party, and seriously investigate any violation of our terms of use behavior. Newdex reserves the right to provide services to any user who participates in activities violating the terms of use.

4.The protection of user data

A number of security measures have been implemented in Newdex to ensure user’s information safe, can not be misused, or tampered. Our data security measures include, but are not limited to: PCI scans, secure sockets layer cryptography, anonymity, internal data access restrictions, and strict office and file access restrictions. But the form of internet storage can not guarantee 100% information security. Therefore, we recommend that you should take independent security precautions to protect your personal information.

5.Service rules

You are committed to complying with the following Newdex service Rules:

5.1 You should comply with the provisions of laws, regulations, regulations and policy requirements to ensure the legality of all sources of digital assets in your account. You must not engage in illegal or other activities that damage Newdex or third-party rights by using Newdex, such as sending or receiving any information that violates the law, violations, infringement of the rights of others, sending or receiving pyramid schemes or other harmful information or statements, unauthorized by Newdex’ information or forged Newdex email header information.

5.2 You should abide by the laws and regulations to properly use and keep the Newdex account and login password security. You take full responsibility for any operation and consequences of using Newdex account and login password, money password, cell phone verification code. You are not allowed to give your Newdex account to others by gift, loan, lease, transfer or otherwise without the consent of Newdex. 

5.3 You agree that you are responsible for all activities (including but not limited to disclosure of information, release of information, internet click consent or submission of all kinds of rules agreement, online renewal agreement or purchase of services, etc.) that happen under your Newdex account and password.

5.4 When you trade digital assets in Newdex, you must not maliciously interfere with the normal operation of digital assets transactions and undermine the order of transactions; you must not interfere with the normal operation of Newdex or interfere with other users’ service by any technical means or other means; you should not maliciously smash Newdex's goodwill by means of fictional facts.

5.5 If you have a dispute with other users due to online transactions, you may not request Newdex to provide relevant information without judicial or administrative way.

5.6 The taxable obligations, and all hardware, software, services and other costs, produce in your use of the services provided by Newdex, are solely judged and assumed by you.

5.7 You should comply with the last agreement and other terms of service rules issued and updated by Newdex, and Newdex reserves the right to terminate the services provided by Newdex at any time. 

Legal Statement

1.Newdex rights and obligations 

1.1 If you do not have the registration qualifications stipulated in this agreement, Newdex reserves the right to refuse your registration. And Newdex reserves the right to decide whether or not to accept your registration under any other circumstances.

1.2 Newdex reserves the right to suspend or terminate the use of the account when we find you are not the initial registrant of the account. 

1.3 Through technical testing, manual sampling, etc., your information is suspected reasonably that what you provided is incorrect, false, invalid or incomplete, Newdex reserves the right to notify you to correct, updatde information, suspend or terminate the offer of Newdex services

1.4 Newdex reserves the right to correct the information when it finds that any of the information displayed on Newdex has a significant error..

1.5 Newdex reserves the right to modify, suspend or terminate Newdex services at any time. Newdex's right to modify or discontinue the services does not require prior notice; If Newdex terminates one or more of Newdex's services, the termination will take effect on the date that Newdex publishes the termination notice on the website.

1.6 Newdex should take the necessary technical means and management measures to ensure the normal operation of Newdex , and provide the necessary and reliable trading environment and transaction services to maintain the order of digital assets trading.

1.7 Newdex to protect your digital assets by strengthening technical inputs and enhancing safety precautions, and is obligated to notify you in advance of foreseeable security risks in your account.

1.8 ,Newdex have the right to delete all kinds of content or information that does not conform to laws, regulations or Newdex regulations on the platform. When executing these rights, Newdex requires no prior notice to you.

1.9 ,Newdex has the right to be in accordance with the laws and regulations of your sovereign country or region, rules, orders and other norms of the requirements, to ask you for more information, and take reasonable measures to meet the requirements of local norms. You have the obligation to cooperate. Newdex reserves the right to suspend or permanently stop opening Newdex and some or all of services to you, in accordance with the laws, regulations, rules, orders, etc. of your sovereign country or region..

1.10 You may not download (except page cache) or modify the Site or any part thereof without our express written consent. This includes prohibiting resale or use of Newdex or its content for commercial purposes. The collection and use of any product listing, description or price is prohibited. The use or modification of any derivative is prohibited; it is forbidden to download or copy account information in order to profit from other businesses. It also prohibits the use of data mining, screen capture, robotics or similar data collection and extraction tools. No part of Newdex or Newdex may be reproduced, sold, resold, accessed, or used for any commercial purpose without our express written consent. You may not use framing technology to attach to the Site, any trademarks, logos or other proprietary information (including images, text, page layout or form) of products offered by Newdex or its affiliates. We may not use any of our meta tags or any other "hidden text" to use our name or trademark without our express written consent. 

1.11 We will only use your personal data as permitted by law. Your personal information is usually used in the following situations: 1.11.1 To fulfill the contract we are about or have reached with you; 1.11.2 To protect the legitimate rights of us (or third parties) (and your rights and fundamental rights do not override these legal rights); 1.11.3 To comply with statutory or regulatory obligations.

2 Limitation of liability and exemption

You understand and accept the under cases，we are not responsible for the following matters.:

2.1 Loss of income;

2.2 Trading profits or contract losses;

2.3 Business interruption

2.4 The loss of money expected to be saved;

2.5 The loss of information;

2.6 Opportunity, goodwill or loss of reputation;

2.7 Damage or loss of data;

2.8 The cost of purchasing alternative products or services;

2.9 Any indirect, special or incidental loss or damage caused by infringement (including negligence), breach of contract, or any other reason, whether such loss or damage may be reasonably foreseeable to us, whether or not we have been informed of the possibility of such loss or damage in advance. 

Note:2.1 strips to 2.9 are independent of each other.

You understand and agree that we shall not be liable for any damages of you in the following circumstances:

2.2.1 We have reasonable grounds to believe that there may be a major violation or breach of contract in your specific transaction. 

2.2.2 We have reasonable grounds to believe that your actions at Newdex are suspected of being illegal or unethical.

2.2.3 Costs and losses resulting from the purchase or acquisition of any data, information or transactions through the Newdex Service.

2.2.4 Your misunderstanding of the Newdex service.

2.2.5 Any other loss related to the services provided by Newdex but it’s not caused by us.

2.2.6 Our information network equipment maintenance, information network connectivity failure, computer, communications or other system failures, power failures, weather reasons, accidents, strikes, labor disputes, riots, uprisings, riots, productivity or insufficient means of production, fire, floods, storms, explosions, war, bank or other partner reasons, the collapse of the digital assets market, the acts of government, the orders of the judicial or executive organs, any other acts that are not within our control or our inability to control, or the causes of the third party, which do not serve or delay the service or cause your loss, all above we shall not be liable for.

2.2.7 We can not guarantee that Newdex contains all the information, procedures, text and so completely safe, not by any viruses, trojans and other malicious programs interference and destruction. So you login, use Newdex any service or download, and use of this way to download any program, information, data, etc. are your personal decisions. And it take risks and possible losses.

2.2.8 We do not make any warranty or commitment to any information, products and business of any third party website linked to Newdex , or any other form of content other than our subject, and if you use any of the services provided by the third party website, Information and products are your personal decisions and assume all the responsibilities arising therefrom.

2.2.9 We do not make any express or implied warranties for your use of the Newdex service, including but not limited to the applicability, error or omission, continuity, accuracy, reliability, and suitability for a particular purpose of the service provided by Newdex . At the same time, we do not make any commitment and assurance to the effectiveness, accuracy, correctness, reliability, quality, stability, completeness and timeliness of the technology and information involved in the services provided by Newdex . Whether to log in or use the services provided by Newdex is your personal decision and risks and possible losses. Our market for digital assets, value and price do not make any express or implied warranties, you understand that the digital assets market is unstable, prices and values can fluctuate or collapse at any time, the transaction of digital assets is your personal freedom to choose and decide and take risks and possible losses.

2.2.10 Our guarantee and commitment stipulated in this Agreement are the only guarantee and statement of our services provided for this Agreement and Newdex and supersedes any guarantee and commitment arising out of any other means and manner, whether written or oral, express or implied. All these guarantee and commitment represent our own guarantee and commitment and do not guarantee that any third party will comply with the warranties and undertakings in this Agreement.

2.2.11 We do not waive any rights not covered by this Agreement that limit, waive or offset our liability for damages to the fullest extent applicable to the law.

2.2.12 You are registered to acknowledge our actions in accordance with the rules stipulated in this Agreement, and any risk arising from you shall be borne by you.

3 Special measures 

If we suspect or have reason to believe that you (or your counterparty) are engaged in suspicious transactions or other suspicious activities, or if you (your counterparty) have violated any of the foregoing warranties or any applicable laws or regulations, we have the right (but not the obligation) to suspend any transaction at Newdex address. Because of you can't exchange digital assects by Newdex, which may cause any loss or gain to you, we make it clear that we are not responsible for it. You agree to be fully liable for any damages incurred by your actions or we must suspend your trade or any third party actions that cause us loss. During the suspension of your transaction, we will conduct an investigation and may ask you to cooperate with us to conduct an investigation.

4 Change usage protocol  We can update the user agreement at any time.

5 Termination of the agreement 

You agree that Newdex reserves the right to suspend, or permanently freeze (cancel) your account at any time without prior notice. We can suspend or terminate your service in Newdex for any reason, and it is not necessary to assume any responsibility for you or any third party. Newdex has the right to continue keeping the transaction data, records and other information related to the account and using the information.

Newdex shall have the right to terminate this Agreement directly by way of cancellation of the account and shall have the right to permanently freeze (unregister) the rights of your account in Newdex :

5.1 The main content of the user information you provide is untrue or inaccurate or incomplete;

5.2 This Agreement (including rules) has been updated or notified, you understand clearly the new rules but unwilling to accept;

5.3 Other situations that Newdex considers should terminate the service.

After your account service is terminated or the account is permanently frozen (cancelled) on the Newdex 's authority, Newdex is not obligated to keep or disclose to you any information in your account. There is no obligation to send information you have not read or sent to you or the third party any.You agree that after the termination of your contract with Newdex, Newdex will still reserve the following rights: keep your user information and all transaction information in the period of your using Newdex service. If you are in violation of this Agreement or the rules during the use of the Newdex Service, Newdex may claim rights against you under this Agreement. After the Newdex has suspended or terminated your Newdex service, you shall deal solely with any dispute, loss or additional costs arising out of the following processing for the conduct of your transaction prior to the suspension or termination of the service in accordance with the following principles, and shall ensure that Newdex is free from any loss or incur any costs. The digital assets that you have uploaded to Newdex before the service is suspended or terminated, Newdex has the right to delete the relevant information of the item while the service is terminated or terminated; you have been with other where the Newdex user has reached a sale and purchase contract, but the contract has not been actually performed, Newdex has the right to delete the relevant information of the trading contract and the digital assets of its transaction; you have been with other Newdex user before the service was aborted or terminated where the user has entered into a contract for sale and has partially performed, Newdex may not delete the transaction, but Newdex has the right to notify you of the transaction at the time of the suspension or termination of the service.

 

) } } export default Home;
